languages.text: Привычный гомон мостика затихает, когда в витражах проплывает тень гигантского судна, появившегося из пустоты. Оно кажется брошенным — корпус потемнел, фонари не горят, а окна разбиты и затянуты густой пеленой. Авгурной команде не удается распознать сигнатуру неактивных двигателей — лишь выхватить светом направленных фонарей истертую надпись на раненном боку крейсера: "Палач"... нет, "Плач королевы". Угрюмую тишину мостика нарушает доклад Мастера вокса... Получен запрос на вокс-передачу. С мертвого корабля.

traits.locale_text: Привычный гомон мостика затихает, когда в витражах проплывает тень гигантского судна, появившегося из пустоты. Оно кажется брошенным — корпус потемнел, фонари не горят, а окна разбиты и затянуты густой пеленой. Авгурной команде не удается распознать сигнатуру неактивных двигателей — лишь выхватить светом направленных фонарей истертую надпись на раненном боку крейсера: "Палач"... нет, "Плач королевы". Угрюмую тишину мостика нарушает доклад Мастера Вокса... Вы получили запрос на вокс-передачу. С мертвого корабля.

languages.text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

traits.locale_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease to be when the shadow of a gigantic voidship that appeared seemingly out of nowhere sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognize the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: you've just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: you've just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: you've just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

languages.text: 某艘不知从哪里冒出来的巨大虚空舰，在彩色玻璃窗上投下了阴影，舰桥上瞬间万籁俱寂。这艘舰船看起来很凄凉，它的船体已经失去光泽，灯光熄灭，窗户也已破碎，笼罩着一片阴霾。扫描甲板无法识别到它熄灭引擎的信号，他们只能看到它破旧的船体，从中辨认出这艘巡洋舰褪色的名字——女王挽歌号。最终，音阵大师的报告打破了阴郁的沉默，她说舰桥刚刚收到了一份音阵通讯……来自这艘没有任何生机的虚空舰。
languages.original_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

某艘不知从哪里冒出来的巨大虚空舰，在彩色玻璃窗上投下了阴影，舰桥上瞬间万籁俱寂。这艘舰船看起来很凄凉，它的船体已经失去光泽，灯光熄灭，窗户也已破碎，笼罩着一片阴霾。俄歇矩阵班组无法识别到它熄灭引擎的信号，他们只能看到它破旧的船体，从中辨认出这艘巡洋舰褪色的名字——女王挽歌号。最终，音阵大师的报告打破了阴郁的沉默，她告诉你刚刚收到了一份音阵通讯……来自这艘没有任何生机的虚空舰。
某艘不知从哪里冒出来的巨大虚空舰，在彩色玻璃窗上投下了阴影，舰桥上瞬间万籁俱寂。这艘舰船看起来很凄凉，它的船体已经失去光泽，灯光熄灭，窗户也已破碎，笼罩着一片阴霾。俄歇矩阵班组无法识别到它熄灭引擎的信号，他们只能看到它破旧的船体，从中辨认出这艘巡洋舰褪色的名字——女王挽歌号。最终，音阵大师的报告打破了阴郁的沉默，她告诉你刚刚收到了一份音阵通讯……来自这艘没有任何生机的虚空舰。

languages.text: どこからともなく現れたかのように見える巨大なヴォイドシップの影がステンドグラスの窓を通り過ぎると、ブリッジからいつもの騒音が消える。船体はくすみ、照明灯は消え、窓ガラスは割れて闇に覆われ、荒れ果てているようだ。占術クルーは、その静かなエンジンの特徴を認識することができない。確認できたのは、老朽化した船体に光を当てたときに浮かんだ、「女王の挽歌」という巡洋艦の色あせた名前だけだった。ヴォクス・マスターの報告が物悲しい静寂を破る。死のヴォイドシップから…ヴォクスキャストを受信したのだ。
languages.original_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

どこからともなく現れたかのように見える巨大なヴォイドシップの影がステンドグラスの窓を通り過ぎると、ブリッジからいつもの騒音が消える。船体はくすみ、照明灯は消え、窓ガラスは割れて闇に覆われ、荒れ果てているようだ。占術クルーは、その静かなエンジンの特徴を認識することができない。確認できたのは、老朽化した船体に光を当てたときに浮かんだ、「女王の挽歌」という巡洋艦の色あせた名前だけだった。ヴォクス・マスターの報告が物悲しい静寂を破る。死のヴォイドシップから…ヴォクスキャストを受信したのだ。

languages.text: Todos los ruidos normales del puente cesan cuando la sombra de una gigantesca nave del vacío, aparentemente surgida de la nada, pasa por delante de las vidrieras. Parece abandonada: el casco está deteriorado, las luces apagadas y las ventanas rotas y tapadas. La tripulación de los augures no puede reconocer la marca de sus silenciosos motores. Solo consiguen aclarar un poco su casco deteriorado y distinguir el nombre descolorido de la nave: Lamento de la Reina. El informe de la maestra de vocos rompe el lúgubre silencio: acaba de recibir una transmisión voco de la nave del vacío inactiva.
languages.original_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

Solo consiguen aclarar un poco su casco deteriorado y distinguir el nombre descolorido de la nave: Lamento de la Reina. languages.text: Die übliche Geräuschkulisse auf der Brücke verstummt, als wie aus dem Nichts der Schatten eines riesigen Raumschiffs an den Buntglasfenstern vorbeigleitet. Es wirkt aufgegeben ... die Hülle ist beschädigt, die Lumen sind tot, die Fenster zerbrochen und verdeckt. Die Auguren-Crew kann die Signatur der stummen Triebwerke nicht erkennen. Es gelingt ihnen nur, die ramponierte Hülle etwas zu beleuchten und den verblichenen Namen des Kreuzers auszumachen: Klage der Königin. Der Bericht der Voxmeisterin durchbricht die beklommene Stille: Die Brücke hat gerade eine Vox-Übertragung empfangen ... von dem toten Raumschiff.
languages.original_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

Es wirkt aufgegeben ... die Hülle ist beschädigt, die Lumen sind tot, die Fenster zerbrochen und verdeckt. Die Auguren-Crew kann die Signatur der stummen Triebwerke nicht erkennen. Es gelingt ihnen nur, die ramponierte Hülle etwas zu beleuchten und den verblichenen Namen des Kreuzers auszumachen: Klage der Königin. Der Bericht der Voxmeisterin durchbricht die beklommene Stille: Die Brücke hat gerade eine Vox-Übertragung empfangen ... von dem toten Raumschiff.

Die übliche Geräuschkulisse auf der Brücke verstummt, als wie aus dem Nichts der Schatten eines riesigen Raumschiffs an den Buntglasfenstern vorbeigleitet. Es wirkt aufgegeben — die Hülle ist beschädigt, die Lumens sind tot, die Fenster sind zerbrochen und verdeckt. Die Auguren-Crew kann die Signatur der stummen Triebwerke nicht erkennen. Es gelingt ihnen nur, die ramponierte Hülle etwas zu beleuchten und den verblichenen Namen des Kreuzers auszumachen: Klage der Königin. Der Bericht der Voxmeisterin durchbricht die beklommene Stille: Du hast gerade eine Vox-Übertragung empfangen ... von dem toten Raumschiff.

languages.text: Tous les bruits habituels de la passerelle s'interrompent subitement alors que l'ombre d'un immense vaisseau surgi de nulle part se matérialise de l'autre côté des baies vitrées ouvragées. Tout porte à croire qu'il est abandonné : sa coque est abîmée, ses lumens éteints et ses vitres brisées sont occultées. Les augures ne reconnaissent pas la signature de ses moteurs silencieux. Ils parviennent tout juste à éclairer faiblement son fuselage délabré le temps de déchiffrer le nom partiellement effacé du croiseur : la Complainte de la Reine. Soudain, le silence de plomb est rompu par un rapport de la maîtresse-vox : la passerelle vient de recevoir une transmission... en provenance du vaisseau fantôme.
languages.original_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.

Ils parviennent tout juste à éclairer faiblement son fuselage délabré le temps de déchiffrer le nom partiellement effacé du croiseur : la Complainte de la Reine. Soudain, le silence de plomb est rompu par un rapport de la maîtresse-vox : la passerelle vient de recevoir une transmission... en provenance du vaisseau fantôme.

languages.text: Âdeta yoktan var olmuş gibi görünen, devasa bir uçsuz gemisine ait gölgenin vitrayla bezenmiş pencerelere vurarak geçmesiyle birlikte köprüdeki alışılageldik tüm sesler kesiliyor. Gemi sahipsiz görünüyor. Gövdesi leke içinde, lümenleri sönmüş ve pencereleri kırılıp örtülmüş. Alamet mürettebatı, sesi kesilmiş motorlarının damgasını tanımlayamıyor. Yalnızca külüstüre dönmüş gövdesiyle ilgili durumu açıklığa kavuşturup kruvazörün solup gitmiş ismini çıkarabiliyor: Kraliçenin Matemi. Voks Üstadı'nın raporu, kasvetli sessizliği bozuyor: Köprü, az önce... Ölü uçsuz gemisinden bir voks yayını aldı.
languages.original_text: All usual noises on the bridge cease when the shadow of a gigantic voidship, seemingly appearing out of nowhere, sails past the stained-glass windows. It seems forlorn — the hull is tarnished, the lumens are dead, and the windows are broken and shrouded. The augur crew can't recognise the signature of its silent engines. They only manage to shed some light on its decrepit hull and make out the faded name of the cruiser: Queen's Lament. The Vox Master's report breaks the sombre silence: the bridge has just received a vox-cast... from the dead voidship.
